text:
Carla Federica Nespolo (4 March 1943 – 4 October 2020) was an Italian politician. She was the President of National Association of Italian Partisans from 2017 until her death. She was a member of the Italian Parliament between 1976 to 1992. Nespolo was born in Novara, Italy. She was a member of the Italian Communist Party.
Nespolo died on 4 October 2020 from a long-illness, aged 77.
